service.name: Assistance for Isolated Children Scheme Second Home Allowance
service.description: AIC Scheme Second Home Allowance (SHA) contributes towards the costs incurred by geographically isolated families in maintaining a second family home for a student to have daily access to appropriate schooling.

Dimension.name: Assistance for Isolated Children Scheme
Dimension.desc: Help for students who cannot go to an appropriate state school because of geographical isolation, disability or special health needs.

Dimension.name: Rural and remote Australians
Dimension.desc: A range of payments and services is available to support people living in rural and remote areas.

Dimension.name: Centrelink
Dimension.desc: Delivering a range of payments and services for people at times of major change.

Dimension.name: Human Services
Dimension.desc: We deliver social and health-related payments and services
